alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 19 at 1:26PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL CONTINUE TO AFFECT PARTS OF JEFFERSON...OSWEGO...AND LEWIS COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow is produce near whiteout conditions with blowing and drifting snow with snowfall rates of 2 to 3 inches per hour. This band was located across northern Oswego, far southern Jefferson, and Lewis county impacting travel on Interstate 81. This band of snow is expected to remain fairly stationary before moving south late this afternoon. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Oswego, Sandy Island Beach State Park, Lowville, Pulaski, Adams, Redfield, Selkirk Shores State Park, Highmarket, Mexico Point State Park, Nine Mile Point, Southwick Beach State Park, Barnes Corners, Whetstone Gulf State Park, Adams Center, Scriba, Richland, New Haven, New Bremen, Watson and Mexico. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 33 and 41. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
